entry.title: Yellow Paper Daisy
entry.summary:
Author: Babysterek

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 62,057Chapters: 20/?Kudos: 140

Summary: ‚ÄúWell,‚Äù Peter says at last, forcing a crooked smile into his voice, ‚Äúat least this time he didn‚Äôt almost get us all killed.‚ÄùDerek swallows. His throat is dry, the words scraping on the way out. ‚ÄúI was drunk.‚Äù They land and disappear without effect. Talia turns then, her gaze settling on him fully. It‚Äôs steady, unreadable, and it makes his shoulders tense despite himself. ‚ÄúYou were careless,‚Äù she says. ‚ÄúYou are a werewolf, and if you got drunk, you laced it with wolfsbane, you did it. Do you understand, In twenty-four years, every scandal has had the same root. You. At some point, it stops being bad luck and becomes character. And I am tired of pretending this is something that merely happens to you.‚Äù --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Derek just wanted a moment of quiet. Instead, he crosses a line with the last person he should trust.....old grudges, bad decisions and a mistake he keeps repeating. "He learned the shape of the poison once, from a woman who wore it like skin. Now hemlock blooms in his own hands, and he cannot tell where she ends and he begins. "

entry.title: Conceptual Mage
entry.summary:
Author: DaoOfGay

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,346Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 150

Summary: After suddenly getting better at LaCrosse, getting to date Allison Argent, and sit at the popular kids table, Scott didn't have any more time for him. Stiles is a bit lonely, but he finally decides to ditch Scott on the day of his mother's death, when Scott doesn't come with him to the cemetery. The next day he thinks he's going crazy because he sees floating symbols on things and every time he stares at them, he gets a word shoved into his head. He almost freaks out until he writes down the symbol for [Light], and his entire room starts to glow. Then he starts seeing these holes in some places, and suddenly he is somewhere else, and there's various of these breaches everywhere. So fuck Scott McCall, this summer vacation, Stiles has something new to explore.

entry.title: When Laura was resurrected, this was NOT what she was expecting
entry.summary:
Author: CoraParker

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,109Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 61

Summary: Laura huffs before shrugging and walking towards her old house.When she reaches the clearing, she‚Äôs expecting to see the burnt shell of her childhood home. Instead, there is a gorgeous house in its place. The place isn‚Äôt as large as the previous house, but it is no less impressive. She starts to walk away from the place to investigate, but she hears laughter from inside.Walking up to one of the windows, she sees something that she never thought possible. Her little brother, Derek, is standing against the kitchen counter drinking coffee. A small smile quirks his lips and he sets down the mug. Laura sees a man sneaking up on him, but before she can call out, the man lunges.Laura watches in confusion as Derek turns around and catches the man, throwing them to the floor. Her brother cradles the man‚Äôs head as they land, an obvious protective gesture. He grins down at the man and shifts, eyes flaring red and teeth elongating. The man under him laughs gleefully before stretching his neck out, exposing it to her brother. And on that neck‚Ä¶is a mating bite.

entry.title: I Hated You!
entry.summary:
Author: Unknown_Hoe

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,561Chapters: 16/?Kudos: 178

Summary: Mieczyslaw Stilinkski, or as most called him Stiles, was adopted by a sheriff and his wife in Beacon Hills, and with that, most of his past vanished. That was until his mother Claudia died when he was eight, and Noah Stilinkski decided it was time to dig up the past and put it together to give it to Stiles later. Stiles uncovered this when he turned seventeen, and he was almost killed again.Stiles had been given the documents that his father had been able to put together. Learning his real name, he was shocked that his mother kept his first name, but his last name was completely foreign, and it seemed like home. Mieczyslaw Mikaelson seemed like home; of course, he still loved his father even after knowing he was his adoptive father. After taking time to swallow the pills of his past, Stiles ran to tell Scott and Derick about the new information he had learned about his life.
